Biography

CAREER HONORS

CUSA All-Tournament Team (2021)

2023: Appeared in 22 games, including eight starts at pitcher ... Registered a 0-5 record with an 8.00 ERA, totaling 45.0 innings with 39 strikeouts ... Tallied a season-high seven strikeouts in just 3.0 innings pitched as the start at No. 4 Ole Miss (2/28) ... Went 4.1 innings in start at Rice (4/8), allowing one run with five strikeouts ... Tossed a season-high 6.1 innings in start against FIU (4/15), allowing only one run ... Pitched 1.2 innings in relief versus Middle Tennessee (5/25) in CUSA Championship, allowing no hits and no runs.

2022: Made 24 appearances and eight starts for the Bulldogs in his sophomore campaign ... Finished the season with a 3-1 record, a 5.46 ERA while striking out 58 over 56.0 innings pitched ... Served as the midweek starter for the majority of the season ... Hurled five strong innings versus UL-Lafayette (4/5) allowing no runs, no walks, three hits and striking out seven ... Put together his best performance of the year tossing seven scoreless innings allowing just three hits, two walks and punched out a season-high eight batters in a 10-0 win over Little Rock (4/19) ... Struck out four or more batters in seven of his appearances ... Pitched the final 3.2 innings in the Austin Regional in game one against Dallas Baptist striking out five and allowing just one earned run.

2021: Made 21 appearances and two starts for the Bulldogs in 2021 … Finished the season with a 4-1 record, a 35-14 strikeout-to-walk ratio and a 7.99 ERA over 32.2 innings pitched … Provided his best performance of the season when the Bulldogs needed it most, pitching 8.1 innings in his first start of the season against No. 19 Southern Miss in the CUSA Tournament (5/29) … Allowed only one run over his first eight innings against Southern Miss, allowing only three earned runs overall with nine strikeouts in his start against the Golden Eagles (5/29) … Struck out a season-high six batters in relief in a win at ULM (3/9) … Delivered four straight scoreless relief appearances from April 10 at Rice to April 24 against Marshall.

2020: Appeared in 6 games with 2 starts in his debut season ... Posted a 3.09 ERA and 1-1 record over 11.2 innings ... Punched out 13 batters (10.02 K/9) while walking 5 (3.86 BB/9) ... Earned the win in his Bulldog debut after tossing 4.2 innings and allowing 2 earned runs against McNeese State (2/18) ... Punched out 5 batters over 3.1 scoreless innings to keep Tech in the game and nearly set up historic comeback against Wichita State (3/8).

PRIOR TO LA TECH: Finished his senior year at Archbishop McCarthy HS with a 2.55 ERA and 3.05 K-to-BB ratio in 49.1 innings ... Earned Sun-Sentinal All-County honors as a senior ... Named to the Broward County All-Star team as a senior ... Member of the 2019 Perfect Game Preseason All-Region team ... Member of the 2018 and 2019 Perfect Game WWBA World Championship All-Tournament teams ... Coached by Aaron Vorachek.

PERSONAL: Born June 8, 2001 in Miami, Florida ... Parents are Alex and Deborah Martinez ... Has two siblings: Timothy and Jason.
